sentences.en: "We're not saying we're outside and above all this," he stresses.
sentences.cn: “我们并不是说我们对此不闻不问,”他强调道.

sentences.en: Are you saying that you're becoming emotionally involved with me?
Engel is quoted as saying that balanced people do not become artists.
sentences.cn: 引用恩格尔的话说就是理性的人是成不了艺术家的。

sentences.en: He fled on Friday, saying he feared for his life.
sentences.cn: 他星期五逃走了，说是担心自己有生命危险。

sentences.en: He hit back angrily, saying such remarks were childishly simplistic.
sentences.cn: 他愤怒地反击，说这些话太过幼稚。

sentences.en: He overturned the conviction, saying the defendant was entrapped.
sentences.cn: 他声称被告是被诱骗的，从而推翻了有罪的判决。

sentences.en: He was on the point of saying something when the phone rang.
sentences.cn: 他正要说话时电话铃响了。

sentences.en: He was sitting there saying, "Yes, the figures make sense."
sentences.cn: 他坐在那儿说：“是的，这些数字可以理解。”

sentences.en: I am, as the saying goes, burnt out.
sentences.cn: 我，正像俗话说的，已筋疲力尽了。

sentences.en: I heard the voices, but couldn't make out what they were saying.
sentences.cn: 我听到有声音，却听不清他们在说些什么。

sentences.en: I'm not saying what he did was good, don't misunderstand me.
sentences.cn: 别误会，我并不是说他所做的是好事。

sentences.en: Nick's bank sent him a letter saying he was £100 overdrawn.
sentences.cn: 银行致函尼克，称他透支了100英镑。

sentences.en: Saying she's improved comes over as a backhanded compliment.
sentences.cn: 说她进步了听起来倒像是一种讽刺。

sentences.en: That, if you'll pardon my saying so, is neither here nor there.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，那根本就不重要。

sentences.en: We are saying nothing until all the details have been finalised.
sentences.cn: 在所有细节最后确定下来之前我们无可奉告。

sentences.en: Yesterday he changed his tune, saying the fare increase was experimental.
sentences.cn: 昨天他变卦了，说提价只是试行。

sentences.en: You can’t judge a book by its cover, as the old saying goes.
sentences.cn: 老话说得好，人不可貌相。

words.tran_cn: 说（say的过去式和过去分词）
讲；说明；例如；声称；假设；指明

phrases.phrase: as (或 so) the saying goes (或 is)

phrases.tran_cn: 不言而喻；理所当然；自不待言

trans.tran_en: a well-known short statement that expresses an idea most people believe is true and wise
